name: HITMAN 2 - Mumbai Pack
description:
The HITMAN 2 - Mumbai Pack gives full access to all permanent and future content in the Hawke's Bay and Mumbai locations. You'll also get access to the Himmelstein Sniper Assassin map!

Nicknamed 'City of Dreams', Mumbai is a treat for any visiting traveler or agent on a mission. Lose yourself in the crowds of the city's famous slums or admire Bollywood movie locations from afar Mumbai will not disappoint with its colorful life and countless hidden secrets.

If you enjoy the Mumbai Pack, you're able to upgrade to the full HITMAN 2 experience, at a reduced cost
